dict.string: Acquire a running board assertion on the target of an AppleEvent for Catalyst applications
If enabled, acquire a running board assertion for the target of an AppleEvent if needed in order to allow it it CPU to handle the event
Acquire a running board assertion on the target of an AppleEvent for all applications
If enabled, acquire a running board assertion for the target of an AppleEvent always (including non-Catalyst applications) in order to allow it it CPU to handle the event
